author: Daniel Villarreal
title: Fauci Says All States Should Enforce Coronavirus Stay-at-Home Orders As Trump Resists Issuing Nationwide Mandate
description: "If you look at what's going on in this country, I just don't understand why we're not doing that. We really should be," Dr. Fauci said.
content: During a CNN interview Thursday evening, Dr. Anthony Fauci, director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID) and a prominent member of President Donald Trump's coronavirus task force, said he believes that all states should have s… [+2959 chars]
